title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.55 - Capital asset
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.55 - Capital asset

State Regulations
(a) An asset
intended for continued use or possession. (b) Common subclassifications are: (1)
land, buildings and equipment, leaseholds
(fixed assets); (2)
goodwill, patents, trademarks, franchises (intangibles); (3)
investments in affiliated
companies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.55

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
